scenario_text.value: Is the battle over already?
Takuma, that’s...!
I’ve never seen that thing before!

(It’s looking at us... It isn’t going to
attack, is it?)
I wonder if it’s on our side?
Who is that, I wonder?
Ah... Wait!
Hey! Wait up, Takuma!
Look, Takuma, it’s Miyuki and Haru!

Really? ...That other creature still bothers
me, but those two take priority.
Are you guys okay? Not hurt anywhere?
We’re fine. A beast protected us.
A beast? But who?
...Renamon.

Renamon... That must be the one we just saw.
You know him from before?
Nope...

I see... What about you, Agumon? Have you
seen him before?
Sorry, can’t say that I have...

Hmm... I don’t know if he’s a friend or
a foe, but at least he saved us...
He reminds me of Garurumon...
But Garurumon’s our enemy!
Yeah, but...

(I hope he’s one of the neutral ones, at
least... We don’t need any more enemies.)

(Whoops, I’d better focus on the guys in
front of me first!)
Can you two walk?
Yeah. Miyuki is fine, too.

Then head that way. Aoi and Saki are right
over there.
I’ll go look for the others.
C’mon, Agumon.
Aye aye!
